sen.j: 霞中庵 竹内栖鳳記念館（かちゅうあん たけうちせいほうきねんかん）は京都府京都市にある美術館。
sen.e: Kachuan Seiho Takeuchi Memorial Museum is an art museum located in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kachuan Seiho Takeuchi Memorial Museum is an art museum located in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 洛西嵯峨にある近代日本画家の巨匠竹内栖鳳が大正初期に建てた別邸の庭園に建ち、館内には竹内栖鳳の作品を中心に小野竹喬、土田麦僊、上村松園ら京都画壇の作品約1000点を収蔵していた。
sen.e: It is in the garden of the modern Japanese-style master painter Seiho TAKEUCHI's second house in Rakuseisaga, and it had the collections of approximately 1000 items including mainly paintings of Seiho TAKEUCHI, and also works of Chikkyo ONO, Bakusen TSUCHIDA, and Shoen UEMURA, who were from the Kyoto School.

It is located in the garden of the second house of the modern Japanese-style master painter Seiho TAKEUCHI in Rakuseisaga, and it contained collections of approximately 1000 items including many paintings by Seiho TAKEUCHI, and also works by Chikkyo ONO, Bakusen TSUCHIDA, and Shoen UEMURA, who were from the Kyoto School.

sen.j: 桂川の流れを取り入れ嵐山を借景とした約3000坪の回遊式日本庭園は、栖鳳の趣向で作庭されたといわれている。
sen.e: Seiho is said to have put his taste into building of this Japanese circuit style garden which borrows the scenery of Arashiyama and takes in water of Katsura-gawa River.
Seiho is said to have used his taste in the creation of this Japanese circuit-style garden which borrows the scenery of Arashiyama and takes in the water of Katsura-gawa River.
sen.cmt: 「put his taste into building」→「used his taste in the creation of」, 「-」挿入, 「the」挿入
sen.e: Seiho is said to have used his taste in the creation of this Japanese circuit-style garden of approximately 9,930 square meters which borrows the scenery of Arashiyama and takes in the water of the Katsura-gawa River.
sen.cmt: 3000坪 （approximately 9,930 square meters) を入れました。"Katsura-gawa River"→"the Katsura-gawa River"に変更しました。

sen.j: 記念館に隣接して栖鳳のアトリエ「霞中庵」が建っている。
sen.e: Seiho's studio 'Kanchuan' (霞中庵) stands next to this memorial museum.

sen.j: 霞中庵の元所有者でホテルなどを運営していた京都プラザグループが経営破綻、所蔵していた美術品の一部は売却された。
sen.e: Some of the collections were sold out as a result of the bankruptcy of Kyoto Plaza Group, a hotel operator, who was the former owner of Kacchuan.
Some of the collections were sold as a result of the bankruptcy of Kyoto Plaza Group, a hotel operator and the former owner of Kachuan.

sen.j: 土地・建物なども一度は競売手続きが進められたがその後中止され、管財人が売却先を探していた。
sen.e: Its land and buildings had been on the verge of being auctioned off, but after the plan was changed, the receiver was looking for buyers.

sen.j: 数十件の購入申し出があったが、霞中庵や同じ敷地内にある竹内栖鳳記念館の保存を条件に株式会社ボークスへの売却が決まり、売却されずに残された栖鳳の代表作「金獅」など、所蔵絵画約70点を含め同11月末に引き渡された。
sen.e: Among a few dozen offers, their sale to Volks Inc. was decided on condition that it would preserve Kachuan and Seiho Takeuchi Memorial Museum in the same compound, and Seiho's representative work 'Kinjishi' (金獅) and other remaining collections of about 70 items were handed over at the end of November 2003.

sen.cmt: 意味がずれてしまうので、「in the same compound」の位置を変えました。

sen.j: 霞中庵は庭園とともに修復して保存し、絵画は竹内栖鳳記念館で保管されているが、現在非公開となっている。
